conditionalForwarderIpAddrs.description:
Set of IPv4 addresses for the DNS server associated with the remote Directory.
Can contain between 1 and 4 values.

createdDateTime.description: Date and time when the Trust was created.

deleteAssociatedConditionalForwarder.description: Whether to delete the conditional forwarder when deleting the Trust relationship.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: Date and time when the Trust was last updated.

remoteDomainName.description: Fully qualified domain name of the remote Directory.

selectiveAuth.description:
Whether to enable selective authentication.
Valid values are `Enabled` and `Disabled`.
Default value is `Disabled`.

stateLastUpdatedDateTime.description: Date and time when the Trust state in `trust_state` was last updated.

trustDirection.description:
The direction of the Trust relationship.
Valid values are `One-Way: Outgoing`, `One-Way: Incoming`, and `Two-Way`.

trustPassword.description:
Password for the Trust.
Does not need to match the passwords for either Directory.
Can contain upper- and lower-case letters, numbers, and punctuation characters.
May be up to 128 characters long.

trustState.description:
State of the Trust relationship.
One of `Created`, `VerifyFailed`,`Verified`, `UpdateFailed`,`Updated`,`Deleted`, or `Failed`.

trustStateReason.description: Reason for the Trust state set in `trust_state`.

trustType.description:
Type of the Trust relationship.
Valid values are `Forest` and `External`.
Default value is `Forest`.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Trust resources.
